rules.description: Switch Ctrl + Backspace and Option + Backspace

manipulators.description: Change caps_lock to control when used as modifier, escape when used alone

rules.description: Map left knob to display brightness
Fn + End to toggle audio source
Fn + PgUp to toggle microphone level
Full QWERTY-to-Dvorak remap (unless qwerty_mode is enabled or using excluded device)
